ygData.subject: Re: Petition
ygData.messageBody:
<HANGS his head, not for the bard or druid, but for the ranger> :)

> ----------
> From: Elena Glenn[SMTP:braveheart@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Monday, June 14, 1999 9:34 AM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Petition
>
> From: "Elena Glenn" <braveheart@...>
>
> Hang your head for me, also. <SMILE> I've started a Bard, a Ranger, and
> a
> Druid.
>
> Leri
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Jones, Brian <brian.jones@...>
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
> Date: Monday, June 14, 1999 5:03 AM
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Petition
>
>
> >From: "Jones, Brian" <brian.jones@...>
> >
> ><heads his head down and offers a silent prayer to Rallos Zek, thinking
> >another warrior has fell to the machinations of Tunare>
> >
> >Angarth, Warrior of the 17th Tier
> >"Periissem ni periisem"
> >
> >
> >> ----------
> >> From: Patricia Halas[SMTP:patty_halas@...]
> >> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> >> Sent: Monday, June 14, 1999 6:39 AM
> >> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> >> Subject: [warriors_eq] Petition
> >>
> >> From: Patricia Halas <patty_halas@...>
> >>
> >> So far I have to agree with everything on the board. I am playing a
> >> Ranger
> >> now (not forever! Just to see how she would do), and find myslef
> kicking
> >> butt. Once I get up to 15 or 16 I will compare my Ranger's abilities
> with
> >>
> >> my Barbarian Warrior. Nevertheless, I agree 100% with taking away the
> >> skill
> >> cap from Warriors. No reason a Warrior shouldn't be better at melee
> than
> >> anyone else.
> >>
> >> Let's do this. Put together a petition and post the email for Verant.
> >>
> >> For the Honor and Glory of Rallos Zek;
> >>
> >> Patty of Halas
> >> Warrior Princess of the 16th Rank
> >> username: Patricia
> >> server: Bristlebane
> >>
> >> or
> >>
> >> Tree Huggers Rule!
> >>
> >> Patty Tiger
> >> Half Elf Ranger of the 6th Rank
> >> username: Patty
> >> server: Bristlebane
